column5: Walking distance to the shops, dining, and more, our comfortable 1 BR puts you near the best in Dallas. New furnishings, modern style, great amenities are just a few features of this apartment. Enjoy complimentary snacks and toiletries to make your stay carefree. Access to recreation room, and not one, not two, but three stunning pools located throughout the community. Nearby, find an urban escape at the Arbor Hills nature preserve in Plano, only 10 miles away.
